B

Ball - Class in com.example.pingpong.Model
Represents the ball used in the game, including its movement mechanics, collision detection, and resizing capabilities.
Ball(double, double) - Constructor for class com.example.pingpong.Model.Ball
Constructs a new Ball with initial settings.
BallManager - Class in com.example.pingpong.Controller
Manages the ball's movements and collisions within the game.
BallManager(Game, GameView, GameController) - Constructor for class com.example.pingpong.Controller.BallManager
Constructs a BallManager with specified game, game view, and game controller.
bounce(Racket) - Method in class com.example.pingpong.Model.Ball
Handles the ball's behavior when it collides with a racket, including inverting the direction, increasing the speed, and adjusting the vertical movement based on the impact location.
build() - Method in class com.example.pingpong.Controller.GameBuilder
Builds and returns a Game object configured with the set parameters.
